idea:

idea: Kriska Genesis Ingredients Private Limited is a corporate entity which was incorporated on 24th June, 2017. Kriska Genesis Ingredients Private Limited is into marketing, distribution, trading, repacking, re-labelling and private label (own brand) supplies of packaged food products and food ingredients. Our products are sold through third party and own online as well as offline retail platforms to direct to consumers as well as institutions.
name: KRISKA GENESIS INGREDIENTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
White Turtle Originals is built on the very  foundation of success & performance that White Turtle Studios has been built on. It is a bold move entering the original content  space where we are looking to develop inhouse content for various platforms &  mediums that range from OTT to various studios, while having the expertise & backing to produce our own content as  well. 

With a team on-board of industry leading script-writers & partners alike  we are looking to fill a gap within the industry of creating binge-worthy & 
trendsetting content that not just entertains, but also inspires &  influences. Leveraging our existing WTS panel of directors, producers & clients, we look collaborate with the best minds in the most efficient way.
name: WHITURTLE ORIGINALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We're a healthy packaged food (FMCG) company, trying to build the world's most trusted, most transparent food brand.
name: FITSHIT HEALTH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We, Eurja Infrastructure are a partnership firm & provide a single window solution for establishing Solar PV power plant.


We have an experience of more than 45 projects from 3 kW to 1000kW with a total cumulative experience of 10 MW in last two years on Individual Bungalow, Row Houses, Educational Institutes, Manufacturing Units, Industrial units , Warehouse, Residential Societies ,Government establishment, factory, Office building, Social Sector establishment and others.


We are a Licensed Electrical Contractor in Maharashtra & Empaneled Channel Partner for CFA (Subsidy) Grid Connected Roof Top Project from MEDA.
name: Eurja Infrastructure
